diff_viz.utils.get_experiment

diff_viz.utils.get_experiment(date, donor, DIV, stimulus, level)[source]

Generates a string for the Traj csv folder you’re working in. This follows the naming convention I use, but you can omit this function and code in the name of the Traj csv folder (second to last cell).
